instructions: Turn on bluetooth for your device. Make sure the Vernier Graphical Analysis Android app is downloaded on your device. Open the Science Journal app . Open the experiment you re working on by tapping the experiment card in the library or create a new experiment by tapping the Plus button at the bottom right of your screen. Tap the Sensor tab. Tap Settings at the right of the sensors toolbar. Scroll down all the way to the bottom. Find your sensor device under Available Devices . Tap the ID of the Arduino device you would like to connect to. The Arduino sensor will now be added to your sensors list.
